body_html:
Mobile device N/A
Also can't get, why error is pointing at the clang files, because I set "use clang: no" while configuring.
I have updated python dependencies that were mentioned in installation guide. I have installed other versions of tensorflow successfully before. Now I've tried also to build it for 1.9 version, but I had another error:

ERROR: /Users/kate/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:309:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core:platform_base':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/platform/posix/env_time.cc':
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/stdint.h'
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/stddef.h'
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/__stddef_max_align_t.h'
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/stdarg.h'
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
INFO: Elapsed time: 17.712s, Critical Path: 2.16s
INFO: 0 processes.
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully

pointing some clang files as well

body:
**Mobile device** N/A
Also can't get, why error is pointing at the clang files, because I set "use clang: no" while configuring.
I have updated python dependencies that were mentioned in installation guide. I have installed other versions of tensorflow successfully before. Now I've tried also to build it for 1.9 version, but I had another error:
```
ERROR: /Users/kate/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:309:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core:platform_base':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/platform/posix/env_time.cc':
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/stdint.h'
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/stddef.h'
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/__stddef_max_align_t.h'
  '/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/lib/clang/10.0.0/include/stdarg.h'
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
INFO: Elapsed time: 17.712s, Critical Path: 2.16s
INFO: 0 processes.
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully
```
pointing some clang files as well
